mapper.select: SELECT PID, PSN, TIM, LCN, FCN, TF, FEE, BAL, TT, ATT, CRN, XRN, LPID, LTIM FROM T_CPU_INVEST_CHECKBACK WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FLAG='1'
SELECT count(1) AS notesSum,sum(TF) AS amountSum from T_CPU_INVEST_CHECKBACK WHERE SETTLE_DATE=#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=#{zipFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FLAG='1'
